name: Putin Slap
description:
IT'S TIME TO SLAP! See if you can get the high score by delivering swift justice to Putin.

Features:

- Incredible slapping gameplay that will challenge your timing skills.

- Several unlockable items that take things to the next level.

- Amazing voice acting!

- Online high scores to see who is the ultimate smacker!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Putin's pointless war has devastated so many lives and someone seriously needs to slap some sense into this maniacal tyrant.

Hopefully this game can give you a small amount of joy during these dark times.

Support Ukraine!
